directions: Heat sesame oil in a wok and saut√© ginger and garlic until fragrant. Place prawns with the shells in the base of the wok. Pour in stock and add seasoning. Allow the stock to come to a quick boil. Once cooked, remove prawns and set aside.
Add transparent vermicelli to the stock in the wok and toss well. Put in mustard greens and simmer until mixture is almost dry. Dish out onto a serving plate and place prawns on top.
ingredients: 175g transparent vermicelli, soaked to soften and drained
300g medium large water prawns, with shells
5 short stalks mustard greens (sawi), cut into 6cm lengths
title: Fried Vermicelli With Poached Prawns
